context_history.content: I want to learn about: html. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

HTML, or HyperText Markup Language, is the standard language used to create the structure of web pages. It acts as a skeleton, using 'tags' to tell the browser which parts of the content are headings, paragraphs, or links.

visual_content.detail: Opening Tag, Content, Closing Tag, Anatomy of an HTML Element
